meanings.sent2: Can ya help me with this?
meanings.sent4: Even the birds know ya are kind.
meanings.sent5: I trust ya with all my secrets.

meanings.sent2: Do ya all want some ice cream?
meanings.sent3: Ya all should come to the party!
meanings.sent4: The stars shine bright for ya all.
meanings.sent5: I appreciate ya all being here.

meanings.sent2: Are ya coming to the game?
meanings.sent3: Ya are the best dancer in town!
meanings.sent4: In the storm, ya are my shelter.
meanings.sent5: I believe ya are capable of anything.
